title: I
description: Take 1 Wound and roll a CON check. On a failed roll, the character will die in D20 rounds (or 1 Time Track reset) unless administered an antidote.

title: II
description: Take 1 Wound and roll a CON (+5) check. On a failed roll, the character will die in D20 rounds (or 1 Time Track reset) unless administered an antidote.

title: III
description: Pass a CON check or receive 1 Wound.

title: IV
description: Pass a CON check or be Knocked Down (no effect if already Knocked Down).
